text: Boiler type, input/output capacity, and efficiency rating match mechanical schedule
Shop drawings approved: piping, venting, wiring, flue route, expansion tanks, and pump layout
Boiler code compliance verified: CSA B149, ASME Section IV, local gas codes
Boiler delivered with CSA/ASME rating plates, installation manual, startup forms
Unit installed level, anchored, and isolated from structure
Primary/secondary piping connected with isolation, check, purge, balancing valves
Expansion tank, pressure relief valve, air separator, and drain valve installed as per design
Condensate drain (if condensing) installed with neutralizer and proper slope
Boiler panel wired with proper disconnect, fusing, and overload protection
BAS/DDC points connected: status, faults, flow, temperature, runtime
Outdoor reset and internal safeties verified: high limit, LWCO, gas valve lockout
Combustion air and flue piping installed per manufacturer and local code
Leak check on all gas fittings performed with certified meter
CO monitor in place and vent termination meets clearance and distance standards
Hydronic system flushed, pressure tested, and air purged
Boiler startup and combustion tuning completed by certified technician
Operating temperatures, pressure, and delta-T across loop verified
Manufacturer startup log and warranty registration completed
